exits.description: the watering hole lies to the east
the forest continues to the south
the grasslands begin to the west

description: the forest is younger here. fewer old trees, smaller plants, a clearer view of the sky. you are more likely to find food to forage here.
investigationDescription: young trees make poor fuel for the fire. better off heading for the older part of the forest south of here.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the east
the forest continues to the south
the grasslands begin to the west

description: the forest is younger here. fewer old trees, smaller plants, a clearer view of the sky. you are more likely to find food to forage for here.
investigationDescription: small beasts catch your eye, scurrying about through the branches of the trees. you have larger prey on your mind today.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the east

the grasslands begin to the west

description: the forest is younger here. fewer old trees, smaller plants, a clearer view of the sky. you are more likely to find food to forage for here.
investigationDescription: the thrill of the hunt has left you, leaving you feeling empty, exhausted. small prey will be too quick for you in this state. better off looking for food here that doesn't flee from you.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the east
the forest continues to the south
the grasslands begin to the west

description: the woods, though sparser here, are still dangerous at night. going too far in would surely leave you lost.
investigationDescription: you cannot see well enough to navigate through the woods at night. a bird of the night calls. a warning?

description: the forest is younger here. fewer old trees, smaller plants, a clearer view of the sky. there is less food here today than there was yesterday, it will need more time to regrow.
investigationDescription: small beasts catch your eye, scurrying about through the branches of the trees.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the east
the forest continues to the south
the grasslands begin to the west

description: the smell of the beast is very close now. it must just be east of here, drinking at the watering hole.
investigationDescription: the chittering of the smaller beasts around you seem almost to mock you.

description: the forest is younger here. fewer old trees, smaller plants, a clearer view of the sky. there is less food here today than there was yesterday, it will need more time to regrow.
investigationDescription: you don't have the energy to look around and carry the carcass. you should head home.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the east
the forest continues to the south
the grasslands begin to the west

description: the woods, though sparser here, are still dangerous at night. Tei would not have come this far north looking for wood.
investigationDescription: you cannot see well enough to navigate through the woods at night. Tei would be south of here.

description: the woods are far too easy to get lost in. Nua and Onah will not be found here.
investigationDescription: there are no signs that Nua and Onah were here.
